text: @RichardDawkins Partially true. Hongkongers neither listened to nor trusted WHO guidelines, just like the CCP. The coronavirus did not wreak havoc in Hong Kong merely because citizens safeguard themselves: Wearing masks (which the WHO advised not to), social distancing, etc.

entity.name: Hong Kong declares coronavirus outbreak an 'emergency'
entity.description: The city’s leader, Carrie Lam, also extended school holidays until February 17, suspended official visits to mainland China and said this year’s Hong Kong Marathon would not take place.
